item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_armor_tou: Can be combined with any armor at an anvil to increase it's armor toughness by one.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_attack_da: Can be combined with any mainhand item at an anvil to increase it's attack damage by 0.75 hearts.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_knockback: Can be combined with any chestplate item at an anvil to increase it's knockback resistance by 10%%.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_luck.desc: Can be combined with any mainhand item at an anvil to increase it's luck by one.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_max_healt: Can be combined with any chestplate item at an anvil to increase it's max health by one.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_movement_: Can be combined with any footwear at an anvil to increase it's movement speed by 10%%.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_block_rea: Can be combined with any mainhand item at an anvil to increase it's block break distance by 1.5 blocks.
item.upgrademodifiers.modifier_armor.des: Can be combined with any armor item at an anvil to increase it's armor amount by one.
